sections.title: Schedule Change Post Format
sections.format: Session [#] now starting [new time] (was [old time]). Doors open [time]. Please adjust accordingly.
sections.example: Session 3 now starting 12:30 PM (was 12:00 PM). Doors open 12:15 PM. Please adjust accordingly.

sections.title: General Telegram Best Practices
do: Post in correct topic (Medical, Seating, Room Reset, etc.)
Use GROUP thread, not private messages
Tag people if specific person needed (@Name)
Respond to posts requiring your response
dont: Gossip or complain in Team Chat
Use for personal socializing during event
